column4: I have xubuntu and need ot install openoffice, but I don't want all of the java that comes with it.  Just pick and choose in add/remove programs, or is there an apt-get I can run?
I am sort of lost... OOo is built on Java... what are you looking to strip out form it?
I already have a jre I installed, and I need THAT version (1.5.18) not the newest one
